actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend daylight savings time to the first Sunday after election day in November.

summary.text: Extends, under the Uniform Time Act, daylight savings time to the first Sunday after the first Monday in November.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend daylight savings time to the first Sunday after election day in November.
